title: Old client still launching
body: On my desktop the client still shows the old league icon and whenever I launch it it takes me to the old client and tells me the new client is out and this is not available anymore I have to press launch to go to the new client everytime its pretty annoying

replies.body:
Hey Vencia,

Just to be clear, you're able to access the updated client, correct?

If yes, go to C: > Riot Games > League of Legends and look for a file named "LeagueClient" it should have the updated client logo by its name. 

Copy the file onto your desktop or make a shortcut.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FJAmTAbw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-02T08:37:47.042+0000)
>
> Hey Vencia,
> 
> Just to be clear, you're able to access the updated client, correct?
> 
> If yes, go to C: > Riot Games > League of Legends and look for a file named "LeagueClient" it should have the updated client logo by its name. 
> 
> Copy the file onto your desktop or make a shortcut.

It's just launching a repair that doesn't end
I'm assuming you launched the "LeagueClient" file. If this is the case, let it run, it'll finish.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FJAmTAbw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-02T09:04:50.547+0000)
>
> I'm assuming you launched the "LeagueClient" file. If this is the case, let it run, it'll finish.

I'm sorry for the lack of info and making you assume but yes I launched that file and the repair hasn't progressed at all I even tried restarting it once

It's scanning a lot of files correct? This happens (even with me). It can take up to an hour. If you haven't progressed from that point;

https://puu.sh/w7IyO/9eb89fa738.png

I know this post was a month ago but HOLY SH*T THANK YOU SO MUCH! I've been looking around subreddits and youtube videos on how to fix this problem and by heavens grace i landed on this post! Gracias amigo!

uhh yeah i still kinda have a problem with this. My league was on a nonstop thing of, reverting back to old client, then it repairs and does it again nonstop. I had to uninstall league >_> And re install but now it has old client on my desktop and it is the old client everytime saying theres a new client, but it when i click launch, it goes to the new client. So my problem is that the L isnt as pretty on my desktop and theres an extra step i dont like doing -.-

If I'm understanding correctly, you launch the client and then it begins the update to the new client every time? Once the client has been updated, you should be able to launch the new client without needing to update each time.

You also mentioned that the league file you launch starts a repair, but that program shouldn't actually be starting a repair unless it's reverted patches and is now trying to repatch. If it's repatching, let it finish up and you should be good to go.
